message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. This item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure this valuable asset at a price that is significantly below its true worth. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
